name: actions-card
description: A Home Assistant custom card that wraps another card to add tap, hold, and double-tap actions

scripts.deploy: NODE_ENV=development npx rollup -c && npm run deploy:copy
scripts.deploy:prod: NODE_ENV=production MINIFY=false npx rollup -c && npm run deploy:copy
scripts.deploy:minified: NODE_ENV=production MINIFY=true npx rollup -c && npm run deploy:copy
scripts.version-check: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); const fs=require('fs'); const indexPath='src/index.js'; const index=fs.readFileSync(indexPath,'utf8'); const versionMatch=index.match(/const CARD_VERSION = [\"']([^\"']+)[\"']/); if(!versionMatch || pkg.version !== versionMatch[1]) { console.error('‚ùå Version mismatch! package.json:',pkg.version,'index.js:',versionMatch?versionMatch[1]:'not found'); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('‚úÖ Versions match:',pkg.version); }"
scripts.size-check: npm run deploy:minified --silent && echo 'üì¶ Final build size:' && ls -lh build/actions-card.js
scripts.validate: npm run version-check && npm run size-check
scripts.pre-release: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run deploy:prod && npm run validate
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run pre-release && npm run deploy:minified && echo 'üéâ Release ready! File: build/actions-card.js'
scripts.test:build: npm run deploy:prod && echo '‚úÖ Production build test passed'
